relevant_communication:
We follow up closely on the Insurance Distribution Directive, IORPII, Pan-European pensions, NIS Directive and the General Data Protection Regulation. 
We regularly meet with policy makers to brief them on our thought leadership related to common priorities, including cyber security, pensions, insurance, natural catastrophes and gender diversity. From time to time, we also contribute to public events on those topics, e.g. organised by members of the EU institutions, or by Marsh & McLennan Companies.
